name: Fidget Spinner Button for Copy All Tab Urls WE
description:
Spin the button at mouse click.
If you own FDM 3D printer, please try printing my spinner.

Caution
Do not place the toolbar button on the left neighbor of the overflow button.
When the toolbar button is placed on the left neighbor of the overflow button, it unintentionally moves to the overflow menu when the toolbar button spins.

About the panel twitching
In Firefox 57, if you spin when hovering the toolbar button, the behavior becomes unstable, so in this style, I set it to spin when clicking the toolbar button.
When you click the toolbar button, the panel twitches while spinning, but if the problem of Firefox 57 is fixed, I will rewrite this style.
additional_info: 2017-10-07: Changed the behavior at mouse hover/click because the clickable range narrows at mouse hover with Firefox 57.b6
